item.title: Prepare week 1
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Monday June 27 Nothing to prepare Tuesday June 28 Watch data and visualization Read (optional): sections 4.1, 5.4, 5.5 Thursday June 30 Watch visualizing data with ggplot2 Read (optional): sections 4.2, 5.3, 5.5

item.title: Prepare week 2
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Monday July 4 No class, no prepare. Happy 4th of July! Tuesday July 5 Watch The language of models Watch Fitting and interpreting models (you can split this video up between Tuesday and Thursday) Read (optional): chapter 7: linear regression with a single predictor Thursday July 7 Watch Models with multiple predictors Read (optional): chapter 8: linear regression with multiple predictors

item.title: Prepare week 3
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Monday July 11 Watch More models with multiple predictors Tuesday July 12 Watch Logistic regression Watch stringR Read (optional): chapter 9: logistic regression Thursday July 14 No preparation required

item.title: Prepare week 4
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Monday July 18 Watch Bootstrapping Read (optional): chapter 12: confidence intervals with bootstrapping Tuesday July 19 Watch Central limit theorem Read (optional): chapter 13: inference with mathematical models Thursday July 21 Watch Hypothesis testing Read (optional): chapter 11: hypothesis testing with randomization Read (optional): chapter 16: inference for a single proportion

item.title: Prepare week 5
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Monday July 25 Watch Hypothesis testing if you did not previously. Read: chapter 16: inference for a single proportion Read: chapter 17: inference for a comparing two proportions Tuesday July 26 Read: chapter 19: inference for a single mean Read (optional): chapter 20: inference for comparing two independent means Thursday July 28 Read: chapter 24: inference for linear regression with a single predictor Read (optional): chapter 25: inference for linear regression with multiple predictors
